description:
Create a sheltered zone between basecamp tents or your car and the picnic table. The Log Flume has varied opening heights on each side to make room for different types of tents, so you'll have a protected area to hang out. The interior features multiple loops for drying clothes or hanging lights.

  • Polyester taffeta fabric with a polyurethane coating for waterproofness
  • Lightweight aluminum poles slide into sleeves for easy setup
  • Centre tarp pole adds extra height
  • Webbing frame at ground level adds additional stability
  • Pre-attached reflective guy lines and tensioners add stability for windy days
  • Multiple interior loops let you hang gear or add lights
  • Includes 14 aluminum hook stakes
  • Backpack-style carry bag with shoulder straps and inner organization pockets
name: Big Agnes Log Flume Shelter
